You are correct, some short men may have well-proportioned bodies, while others may have proportions that appear off. For short men with well-proportioned bodies, choosing clothes that fit well and flatter their body shape is important. This can include clothes that are tailored to fit their body shape, as well as clothes that create the illusion of height, such as those with vertical lines or monochromatic colors.

For short men whose proportions appear off, it can be helpful to focus on clothes that can help create balance and symmetry in their appearance. This can include choosing clothes that fit well around the shoulders and chest, and avoiding clothes that are too loose or baggy. Wearing clothes that are well tailored to their body shape can also help to create a more proportionate appearance.

It's also important to keep in mind that every person is unique, and the most important thing is to choose clothes that make you feel good and confident. Experiment with different styles, colors, and patterns, and find what works best for you and your body shape.
